snippet: The number of American children living in poor households fell by 1.4 million in 2013, a report says.
abstract: Census Bureau reports that poverty rate declined in 2013, for first time since 2006, but at same time that there was no statistically significant change in number of poor people or in income for typical American household.
lead_paragraph: The number of American children living in poor households fell by 1.4 million in 2013, a report says.

headline.main: Number of Children Living in Poverty Drops Sharply, Census Bureau Reports
headline.print_headline: Number of Children Living in Poverty Drops Sharply, Census Bureau Reports
